washing_hands.name: Washing Hands
steps: Turn on the water and wet your hands
Apply soap to your hands
Scrub your hands together for 20 seconds
Rinse your hands thoroughly with water
Dry your hands with a towel

cleaning_bathroom.name: Cleaning the Bathroom
steps: Gather cleaning supplies: spray, sponge, and paper towels
Spray the sink and counter with cleaning solution
Wipe down the sink, counter, and mirror
Clean the toilet with disinfectant
Sweep or mop the floor and put supplies away

laundry_large_load.name: Large Load Wash Cycle
laundry_large_load.description: Complete washing machine routine for a large load of clothes
steps: Open the washing machine door
Load your clothes into the washing machine
Add high amount of detergent to the detergent dispenser
Close the washing machine door
Set the dial to heavy soil level
Set the temperature to hot water
Press start on the washing machine

laundry_small_load.name: Small Load Wash Cycle
laundry_small_load.description: Complete washing machine routine for a small load of clothes
steps: Open the washing machine door
Load your clothes into the washing machine
Add low amount of detergent to the detergent dispenser
Close the washing machine door
Set the dial to light soil level
Set the temperature to cold water
Press start on the washing machine

laundry_normal_load.name: Normal Load Wash Cycle
laundry_normal_load.description: Complete washing machine routine for a normal load of clothes
steps: Open the washing machine door
Load your clothes into the washing machine
Add medium amount of detergent to the detergent dispenser
Close the washing machine door
Set the dial to normal soil level
Set the temperature to warm water
Press start on the washing machine
